story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded in 2006 by a group of passionate travelers, EGYPET_RA TOURS was born from a simple belief: that travel has the power to transform lives, broaden perspectives, and create lasting memories. What started as a small local tour company has grown into a global platform connecting adventurous souls with extraordinary experiences around the world.
story.p2: Today, we've helped over 50,000 travelers discover hidden gems, immerse themselves in local cultures, and create stories they'll share for a lifetime. Our commitment remains the same: to provide authentic, sustainable, and transformative travel experiences that benefit both our travelers and the communities we visit.

q1.q: How far in advance should I book?
q1.a: We recommend booking at least 2-3 months in advance for international tours and 4-6 weeks for domestic tours to ensure availability.

q2.q: What's included in the tour price?
q2.a: Tour prices typically include accommodation, transportation, guided activities, and some meals. Check each tour's details for specific inclusions.

q3.a: Absolutely! Contact us to discuss custom itineraries tailored to your preferences, group size, and budget.

q4.q: What if I need to cancel?
q4.a: Our cancellation policy varies by tour. Most tours offer full refunds if cancelled 30+ days in advance. Check specific terms when booking.
